banner.bannerSub: I create beautiful dynamic and functional web pages and applications

quote.quoteBig: With great power comes great electricity bill

about-me.aboutP1: I am a frontend developer living in Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Over the last few years, I have developed my skills in building responsive websites from scratch and turned them into modern and user-friendly web applications.
about-me.aboutP2: My calling is to turn my creativity and knowledge into web development that will help my clients create their online presence. I am always eager to learn the latest technologies and frameworks to keep up with the latest trends in web development.

contacts.contactsText: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me

funFacts.football: He was a former professional footballer
funFacts.game: I relax playing games like Dota 2, Counter-Strike
